news_header: Two Turkish businessmen face consequences after criticizing the undemocratic regime, leading to investigations and travel bans.
news_original_title: Liikemiehet kritisoivat Turkin hallintoa – seurauksena kuulustelut ja matkustuskielto
news_text: Two Turkish businessmen, Omer Aras and Orhan Turan, criticized the undemocratic nature of the Turkish regime, resulting in investigations against them. The government accused them of trying to influence a fair trial and spreading misinformation. Following their criticism, they faced police action and were later banned from traveling.
